special_text:
[+1]: Create a 1/1 blue Dream creature token, then put a number of +1/+1 counters on it equal to the number of tapped creatures on the battlefield.
[-2]: Choose target player. Put a stun counter on each creature that player controls, then tap up to two of those creatures.
[-8]: You control target player during that player’s next turn. Whenever you cast a spell during that turn, copy it. You may choose new targets for the copy.
